about: I have done my bachelors in commerce and after completeing I joined Tcs and have been working here for the past four years. In 2021 I decided to change my career feild and few of my friend are software engineers, I observed their work and did some of my own research and found softwarer development very intriguing. Solving complex problems, learning about data structures and algorythms buling websities clone and learning about different frame works really exicted me. It was then that I got to know about Masai and then got myself enrolled for the full stack software developer course. I keenly looking forward to use the skills and knowledge that I have acquired at Masai to the best of my ability and build effecient applications.
